summary: Comprehensive testing of GameShop Nepal e-commerce website completed. All backend APIs working (18/18 tests pass). Frontend loads correctly with no console errors. Admin login and all admin pages functional. One data issue found: product images pointing to old domain (darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com) returning 404.

fixed.issue: Test was expecting list but API returns single document. Updated test to match current API behavior.

issues: Product images showing alt text instead of images - images are hosted on old domain (darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com) which returns 404
Product images not loading - same issue with old domain URLs

data_issues.issue: Product image URLs pointing to wrong domain
data_issues.details: All product image_url fields contain URLs like 'https://darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com/api/uploads/...' which return 404. Images need to be re-uploaded or URLs updated to current domain.

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with products and reviews
Admin dashboard loads after login (shows 2 categories, 5 products, 23 reviews)
Admin products page loads and shows all 5 products
Admin orders page loads (21 total orders, 14 pending, 4 confirmed, 3 completed)
Admin categories page loads (SUBSCRIPTIONS, GAME SERVICE)
No console errors on admin pages
action_items: HIGH: Fix product image URLs - currently pointing to old domain (darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com) which returns 404. Either re-upload images or update URLs in database to use current domain (premium-dshop.preview.emergentagent.com)
critical_code_review_comments: Product images are stored with absolute URLs to a different domain - consider using relative URLs or storing images on a CDN for portability
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_api.py - Updated social links test to match current API response format

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all features working, only image loading issue due to data)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Product images need to be re-uploaded or URLs updated in database. The images are stored with absolute URLs pointing to 'darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com' which is not accessible. Current domain is 'premium-dshop.preview.emergentagent.com'. Backend tests all pass. Admin panel fully functional.

rca_of_the_issue.issue: Product images not loading (showing alt text)
rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: Product image_url fields in database contain URLs pointing to old domain 'darkdigital.preview.emergentagent.com' which returns 404. This appears to be from a previous deployment or migration.
rca_of_the_issue.fix: Update product image URLs in MongoDB to use current domain or re-upload images through admin panel
rca_of_the_issue.prevention: Use relative URLs for uploaded images or store on CDN
